tests package¶

Submodules¶

tests.test_sunrise module¶

tests.test_sunrise.test_day_number_initial()¶

Tests the day number for the first day at the zeroth hour.

tests.test_sunrise.test_day_number_later()¶

Tests the day number for the 365th day at the first hour.

tests.test_sunrise.test_declination_initial()¶

Tests the declination for a non-leap year at six minutes on the first day. The observed value comes from https://www.esrl.noaa .gov/gmd/grad/solcalc/ NOAA_Solar_Calculations_day.xls where the Latitude was set to 40.081798, Longitude to -88.208139, TimeZone to -6, Date to 1/1/18, and the six minute declination was used.

tests.test_sunrise.test_declination_initial_leap_year()¶

Tests the declination for a leap year at six minutes on the first day. The observed value comes from https://www.esrl.noaa .gov/gmd/grad/solcalc/ NOAA_Solar_Calculations_day.xls where the Latitude was set to 40.081798, Longitude to -88.208139, TimeZone to -6, Date to 1/1/20, and the six minute declination was used.

tests.test_sunrise.test_declination_later()¶

Tests the declination for a non-leap year at six minutes on the 365th day. The observed value comes from https://www.esrl.noaa .gov/gmd/grad/solcalc/ NOAA_Solar_Calculations_day.xls where the Latitude was set to 40.081798, Longitude to -88.208139, TimeZone to -6, Date to 1/1/19, and the six minute declination was used.

tests.test_sunrise.test_declination_later_leap_year()¶

Tests the declination for a leap year at six minutes on the 366th day. The observed value comes from https://www.esrl.noaa .gov/gmd/grad/solcalc/ NOAA_Solar_Calculations_day.xls where the Latitude was set to 40.081798, Longitude to -88.208139, TimeZone to -6, Date to 1/1/21, and the six minute declination was used.

tests.test_sunrise.test_equation_of_time_initial()¶

Tests the equation of time for a non-leap year at six minutes on the first day. The observed value comes from https://www.esrl.noaa .gov/gmd/grad/solcalc/ NOAA_Solar_Calculations_day.xls where the Latitude was set to 40.081798, Longitude to -88.208139, TimeZone to -6, Date to 1/1/18, and the six minute declination was used.

tests.test_sunrise.test_equation_of_time_initial_leap_year()¶

Tests the equation of time for a leap year at six minutes on the first day. The observed value comes from https://www.esrl.noaa .gov/gmd/grad/solcalc/ NOAA_Solar_Calculations_day.xls where the Latitude was set to 40.081798, Longitude to -88.208139, TimeZone to -6, Date to 1/1/20, and the six minute declination was used.

tests.test_sunrise.test_equation_of_time_later()¶

Tests the equation of time for a non-leap year at six minutes on the 365th day. The observed value comes from https://www.esrl.noaa .gov/gmd/grad/solcalc/ NOAA_Solar_Calculations_day.xls where the Latitude was set to 40.081798, Longitude to -88.208139, TimeZone to -6, Date to 1/1/19, and the six minute declination was used.

tests.test_sunrise.test_equation_of_time_later_leap_year()¶

Tests the equation of time for a leap year at six minutes on the 366th day. The observed value comes from https://www.esrl.noaa .gov/gmd/grad/solcalc/ NOAA_Solar_Calculations_day.xls where the Latitude was set to 40.081798, Longitude to -88.208139, TimeZone to -6, Date to 1/1/21, and the six minute declination was used.

tests.test_sunrise.test_frac_year_initial()¶

Tests if year fraction is correct for time zero on the first day for a non- leap year.

tests.test_sunrise.test_frac_year_initial_leap_year()¶

Tests if year fraction is correct for time zero on the first day for a leap year.

tests.test_sunrise.test_frac_year_later()¶

Tests if year fraction is correct for time zero on the 365th day for a non- leap year.

tests.test_sunrise.test_frac_year_later_leap_year()¶

Tests if year fraction is correct for time zero on the 365th day for a leap year.

tests.test_sunrise.test_generate_elevation_series()¶

Tests the generate_time_series for hour_angle at Chicago’s LSTM at a longitude of -88.244027, latitude of 40.081798, on the first day of a non leap year with an hour range of [0.1, 1]. The observed values were calculated with https://www.esrl.noaa.gov/gmd/grad/solcalc/ NOAA_Solar_Calculations_day.xls set to the specifications above.

tests.test_sunrise.test_hour_angle_initial()¶

Tests hour angle for Chicago’s LSTM at time zero of the first day of a non leap year at a longitude of -88.208139.

tests.test_sunrise.test_hour_angle_one_year()¶

Tests hour_angle for Chicago’s LSTM at time zero of the 366th day of a leap year at a longitude of -88.208139.

tests.test_sunrise.test_hour_number_initial()¶

Tests the hour at an initial and then at day and time zero.

tests.test_sunrise.test_hour_number_later()¶

Tests the hour 365 days later and then at time zero.

tests.test_sunrise.test_local_meridian()¶

Tests the local standard time meridian for a specific UTC. The test was performed with Chicago time (UTC-6).

tests.test_sunrise.test_local_solar_time_initial()¶

Tests time correction for Chicago’s LSTM at time zero of the first day of a non leap year at a longitude of -88.208139.

tests.test_sunrise.test_local_solar_time_one_year()¶

Tests time correction for Chicago’s LSTM at time zero of the 365th day of a non leap year at a longitude of -88.208139.

tests.test_sunrise.test_local_time_initial()¶

Tests the local time at time zero.

tests.test_sunrise.test_local_time_later()¶

Tests the local time at time for the 365th day at the first hour.

tests.test_sunrise.test_solar_elevation_initial()¶

Tests the solar_elevation for hour_angle at Chicago’s LSTM, at a longitude of -88.244027, latitude of 40.081798, declination angle of -22.99872231 (which corresponds to six minutes into the first day of a non leap year).

tests.test_sunrise.test_solar_elevation_one_year()¶

Tests the solar_elevation for hour_angle at Chicago’s LSTM, at a longitude of -88.244027, latitude of 40.081798, declination angle of -22.99872231 (which corresponds to

six minutes into the 366th day of a leap year).

tests.test_sunrise.test_time_correction_initial()¶

Tests the time correction for longitude of -88.208139, with the lstm for Chicago, and the equation of time for a non leap year at time zero on the first day.

tests.test_sunrise.test_time_correction_initial_leap_year()¶

Tests the time correction for longitude of -88.208139, with the lstm for Chicago, and the equation of time for a leap year at time zero on the first day.

tests.test_sunrise.test_time_correction_later_leap_year()¶

Tests the time correction for longitude of -88.208139, with the lstm for Chicago, and the equation of time for a leap year at time zero on the 366th day.

tests.test_sunrise.test_time_correction_one_year()¶

Tests the time correction for longitude of -88.208139, with the lstm for Chicago, and the equation of time for a non leap year at time zero on the 365th day.

Case 1: mse returns float
